channel.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
channel.description:
Second review. I've increased the sound quality but I'm still working on finding the right levels. I've increased the length because if you consume media like I do, I usually have it in another tab and listen to these things as background noise. The length and pace may change next video. Felt a bit lengthy. Excuse the incoherent rambling. Obviously this is just first impressions and I may be wrong about many things. I make this clear though. Also, I'm using a new channel. Enjoy.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I11DpC-Wz3g[/youtube]
Their Thread: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668703.0.html

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @Pipe_Dream Pipe Dream
item.description:
@Pipe_Dream wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:23, topic:550376”][quote author=Pipe Dream link=topic=669287.msg4476004#msg4476004 date=1425955063]
You definitely have that “YouTube” voice, I enjoyed listening. Even though anyone would take one look at this server and walk away, you gave it a chance with real constructive feedback. I liked that. I really hope the owner takes everything you say into consideration.
[/quote]
Stop telling him stuff that isn’t true to make him feel better.

  1. The sound quality is terrible and his voice is dull.
  2. He spends to much time talking without something happening on the screen.[/quote]

It’s adequate for this type of thing where he will probably only have 100 people view it, and his speech was insightful at times. He doesn’t need to be clicking if he is talking about something interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Pipe Dream:

You definitely have that “YouTube” voice, I enjoyed listening. Even though anyone would take one look at this server and walk away, you gave it a chance with real constructive feedback. I liked that. I really hope the owner takes everything you say into consideration.

Stop telling him stuff that isn’t true to make him feel better.

  1. The sound quality is terrible and his voice is dull.
  2. He spends to much time talking without something happening on the screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @Pipe_Dream Pipe Dream
item.description:
@Pipe_Dream wrote:

You definitely have that “YouTube” voice, I enjoyed listening. Even though anyone would take one look at this server and walk away, you gave it a chance with real constructive feedback. I liked that. I really hope the owner takes everything you say into consideration.

One thing I would of liked to see though, would of been a little bit of training. Test the exp rates and drops on your next review. I feel the same way you do about certain aspects you raised, about polishing the game, not pushing votes/donations on players too much. The problem is I don’t think most people think the same way.

This video was some what educational, and I hope you can make an impact on the quality of servers with your future videos. Lastly, the rambling is good. It’s relevant and I hope you don’t change your structure when making future reviews. Keep It Simple Stupid.

Subscribed. #first

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

tyb97:

Yeah, the review is kinda long. I was playing a game while I listened to it in the background. Might I suggest a script of questions that you have to answer about every server while talking so you can get all the points across quickly without too much rambling?

I’m still experimenting with lengths

Miss Silabsoft:

please use runeagent and dupe phats in next video

Haha I’ll think I’ll do that with another person on Skype.

Soulcist:

Is you clicking off a few inches from the actual button of the client or your computer? For example at 12:33, you’re clicking off a view inches or so.

I misread what sk8er said last time. It occurs during the recording. The recording software I use doesn’t seem to play well with the clients. I haven’t figured out a way to work around it without making the display seem all wonky.

[quote=“AbaddonScape, post:16, topic:550376”]@Tree
I’d suggest coming back in a few weeks or so…?
I think itd be cool i dont know just somthing you can think about
Like every server you go to go back in a couple weeks to see whats changed and what not.[/quote]

Yeah, I don’t mind doing that at all to see what has changed.
Even if you want to join me on Skype at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Just as I suspected, most of that has been ripped out of other bases. Nothing I saw there didn’t match some other base, even the damn colors of the text on certain PVP features and such were the same as other bases.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews AbaddonScape
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I didn’t watch the entire video, I’ll finish it later.
But your whole spiel on the donators around 9 minutes in. Yes. That’s the issue with modern servers.
They are calling paid memberships or paid features “donator” features.
Donations should be accepted at generally any value, and then you can reward users if they do bigger donations, or donate a lot over time. And the rewards, if any, shouldn’t be “game breaking” either.

Read full topic
